thread.title: Las Vegas Chic la Vie Medical Spa Now Offering Laser Genesis and HydraFacial MD
thread.title_full: Las Vegas Chic la Vie Medical Spa Now Offering Laser Genesis and HydraFacial MD

title: Las Vegas Chic la Vie Medical Spa Now Offering Laser Genesis and HydraFacial MD
text:
October 14, 2015 at 12:06 PM EDT Las Vegas Chic la Vie Medical Spa Now Offering Laser Genesis and HydraFacial MD News Source: WiredPRNews.comLas Vegas, Nevada, United States , 10/14/2015 /SubmitPressRelease123/
Las Vegas - Chic la Vie, the medical spa component of Smith Plastic Surgery in Las Vegas is pleased to announce the addition of two advanced technologies for patients. Laser Genesis and the HydraFacial MD have been added to the list of treatments offered by the medspa for helping individuals achieve a broader range of goals for improving the appearance of their skin.
